title: Hobblefiend (#152)
body:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hobblefiend.

title: Hellkite Punisher (#151)
body:
Flying
{R}: Hellkite Punisher gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

title: Heartfire Immolator (#150)
body:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{R}, Sacrifice Heartfire Immolator: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

title: Havoc Jester (#149)
body: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Havoc Jester deals 1 damage to any target.

title: Goblin Wizardry (#148)
body: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)

title: Goblin Arsonist (#147)
body: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

title: Gadrak, the Crown-Scourge (#146)
body:
Flying
Gadrak, the Crown-Scourge can't attack unless you control four or more artifacts.
At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token for each nontoken creature that died this turn. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

title: Furor of the Bitten (#145)
body:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

title: Furious Rise (#144)
body: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Furious Rise.

title: Fiery Emancipation (#143)
body: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

title: Double Vision (#142)
body: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

title: Destructive Tampering (#141)
body:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

title: Crash Through (#140)
body:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

title: Conspicuous Snoop (#139)
body:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may cast Goblin spells from the top of your library.
As long as the top card of your library is a Goblin card, Conspicuous Snoop has all activated abilities of that card.

title: Chandra's Pyreling (#138)
body: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

title: Chandra's Magmutt (#137)
body: {T}: Chandra's Magmutt deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

title: Chandra's Incinerator (#136)
body:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total amount of noncombat damage dealt to your opponents this turn.
Trample
Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Incinerator deals that much damage to target creature or planeswalker that player controls.

title: Chandra, Heart of Fire (#135)
body:
+1: Discard your hand, then exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.
+1: Chandra, Heart of Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
−9: Search your graveyard and library for any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards, exile them, then shuffle. You may cast them this turn. Add six {R}.

title: Burn Bright (#134)
body: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

title: Brash Taunter (#133)
body:
Indestructible
Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.

title: Bone Pit Brute (#132)
body:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Bone Pit Brute enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

title: Bolt Hound (#131)
body:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Whenever Bolt Hound attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

title: Battle-Rattle Shaman (#130)
body: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

title: Witch's Cauldron (#129)
body: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

title: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose (#127)
body:
Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
{3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

title: Village Rites (#126)
body:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.

title: Thieves' Guild Enforcer (#125)
body:
Flash
Whenever Thieves' Guild Enforcer or another Rogue enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills two cards.
As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Thieves' Guild Enforcer gets +2/+1 and has deathtouch.

title: Tavern Swindler (#124)
body: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

title: Skeleton Archer (#123)
body: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

title: Silversmote Ghoul (#122)
body:
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, return Silversmote Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Silversmote Ghoul: Draw a card.

title: Sanguine Indulgence (#121)
body:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you've gained 3 or more life this turn.
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

title: Sanctum of Stone Fangs (#120)
body: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of Shrines you control.

title: Rise Again (#119)
body: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

title: Pestilent Haze (#118)
body:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Remove two loyalty counters from each planeswalker.

title: Peer into the Abyss (#117)
body: Target player draws cards equal to half the number of cards in their library and loses half their life. Round up each time.

title: Necromentia (#116)
body: Choose a card name other than a basic land card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then creates a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card exiled from their hand this way.

title: Mind Rot (#115)
body: Target player discards two cards.

title: Massacre Wurm (#114)
body:
When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

title: Masked Blackguard (#113)
body:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
{2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

title: Malefic Scythe (#112)
body:
Malefic Scythe enters the battlefield with a soul counter on it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each soul counter on Malefic Scythe.
Whenever equipped creature dies, put a soul counter on Malefic Scythe.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

title: Liliana's Steward (#111)
body: {T}, Sacrifice Liliana's Steward: Target opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

title: Liliana's Standard Bearer (#110)
body:
Flash
When Liliana's Standard Bearer enters the battlefield, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn.

title: Liliana's Devotee (#109)
body:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

title: Liliana, Waker of the Dead (#108)
body:
+1: Each player discards a card. Each opponent who can't loses 3 life.
−3: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste."

title: Kitesail Freebooter (#107)
body:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

title: Infernal Scarring (#105)
body:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

title: Hooded Blightfang (#104)
body:
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker.

title: Grim Tutor (#103)
body: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.

title: Goremand (#101)
body:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Flying
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Goremand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

title: Gloom Sower (#100)
body: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

title: Finishing Blow (#99)
body: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

title: Fetid Imp (#98)
body:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

title: Eliminate (#97)
body: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

title: Duress (#96)
body: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

title: Demonic Embrace (#95)
body:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.
You may cast Demonic Embrace from your graveyard by paying 3 life and discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

title: Deathbloom Thallid (#94)
body: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

title: Crypt Lurker (#93)
body: When Crypt Lurker enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card. If you do, draw a card.

title: Caged Zombie (#91)
body: {1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 2 life. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

title: Bad Deal (#89)
body: You draw two cards and each opponent discards two cards. Each player loses 2 life.

title: Archfiend's Vessel (#88)
body:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
When Archfiend's Vessel enters the battlefield, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, exile it. If you do, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

title: Alchemist's Gift (#87)
body: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

title: Wall of Runes (#85)
body:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

title: Waker of Waves (#84)
body:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
{1}{U}, Discard Waker of Waves: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

title: Vodalian Arcanist (#83)
body: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

title: Unsubstantiate (#82)
body: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

title: Tome Anima (#81)
body: Tome Anima can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

title: Tolarian Kraken (#80)
body: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, you may tap or untap target creature.

title: Tide Skimmer (#79)
body:
Flying
Whenever you attack with two or more creatures with flying, draw a card.

title: Teferi's Tutelage (#78)
body:
When Teferi's Tutelage enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

title: Teferi's Protege (#77)
body: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

title: Teferi's Ageless Insight (#76)
body: If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

title: Teferi, Master of Time (#75)
body:
You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.
+1: Draw a card, then discard a card.
−3: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
−10: Take two extra turns after this one.

title: Sublime Epiphany (#74)
body:
Choose one or more —
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

title: Stormwing Entity (#73)
body:
This spell costs {2}{U} less to cast if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Stormwing Entity enters the battlefield, scry 2.

title: Spined Megalodon (#72)
body:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Spined Megalodon attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

title: Shipwreck Dowser (#71)
body:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Shipwreck Dowser enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

title: Shacklegeist (#70)
body:
Flying
Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying.
Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.

title: See the Truth (#69)
body: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, put each of those cards into your hand instead.

title: Pursued Whale (#60)
body:
When Pursued Whale enters the battlefield, each opponent creates a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with "This creature can't block" and "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."
Spells your opponents cast that target Pursued Whale cost {3} more to cast.
